desc: Voyager Espresso is a Specialty coffee roaster and cafe serving New York City since 2015. We source our beans from local fair-trade organizations' farms around the globe to provide you with an exceptional cup of coffee every time. Learn more about us here!

layout.text: Navigate the exciting universe of posibilities in flavors and aromas that coffee has to offer.
We source beans from some of the most remarkable growers around the world, and roast them with the utmost respect to their craftsmanship in order to produce a cup of excellence every time.
